Package org.gephi.preview.api

Interface G2DTarget

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RenderTarget
    public interface G2DTarget
extends RenderTarget
    Rendering target to Java2d.

    Users should usegetGraphics() method for drawing.

    Author:
    Mathieu Bastian

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.gephi.preview.api.RenderTarget
